gw.api.contact

Class LinkStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.contact.LinkStatus

  • public class LinkStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the status of a Contact with respect to the Address Book.

    The possible {@link com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.ContactLinkStatus} enum values are:

    UNLINKED
    BROKEN
    Linked but the contact was not found in the Address Book.
    NOT_SYNCED
    Linked but not in sync because the remote contact has changed. The local contact might or might not have changed since last sync.
    SYNCED_REMOTE
    Linked but not in sync because the local contact has changed. The remote contact has not changed since the last sync. Compare the local and remote contact to see if key match fields were changed to prevent overwriting the remote contact in error.
    SYNCED
    UNKNOWN
    An Address Book error occurred.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean Broken
      Tests if the current link status is broken or not.
      java.lang.String DifferentRelationshipsMessage
      Get a message with the types of relationships that are different between the local and remote contacts. Only primary-relationships, as defined in the contact-sync-config.xml, are considered for this list. We only return the TYPES of the relationships that are different because the full list of differences may be too long for a message on the screen.
      boolean Known
      Tests if the current link status is known or not. The link status is always unknown when the Address Book is down.
      java.lang.String LinkStatusMessage
      Returns the appropriate localized message, depending on the linkStatus as defined in the display-property Java.ContactLinkStatus.linkStatus.
      com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.ContactLinkStatus LinkStatusValue
      See the {@link LinkStatus} class page for the possible enum values.
      boolean Linked
      Verifies a link status is one of: BROKEN Linked but the contact was not found in the Address Book. NOT_SYNCED Linked but not in sync because the remote contact has changed. The local contact might or might not have changed since last sync. SYNCED_REMOTE Linked but not in sync because the local contact has changed. The remote contact has not changed since the last sync. Compare the local and remote contact to see if key match fields were changed to prevent overwriting the remote contact in error. SYNCED Linked and the key local and remote contact fields are in agreement.
      boolean Synced
      Tests if the current link status is synced or not.
      boolean SyncedRemote
      Verifies a link status is one of: SYNCED_REMOTE Linked but not in sync because the local contact has changed. The remote contact has not changed since the last sync. Compare the local and remote contact to see if key match fields were changed to prevent overwriting the remote contact in error. SYNCED Linked and the key local and remote contact fields are in agreement.

    • Field Detail

      • Broken

        boolean Broken
        Tests if the current link status is broken or not.

      • DifferentRelationshipsMessage

        java.lang.String DifferentRelationshipsMessage

        Get a message with the types of relationships that are different between the local and remote contacts. Only primary-relationships, as defined in the contact-sync-config.xml, are considered for this list. We only return the TYPES of the relationships that are different because the full list of differences may be too long for a message on the screen.

      • Known

        boolean Known
        Tests if the current link status is known or not. The link status is always unknown when the Address Book is down.

      • LinkStatusMessage

        java.lang.String LinkStatusMessage
        Returns the appropriate localized message, depending on the linkStatus as defined in the display-property Java.ContactLinkStatus.linkStatus.

      • LinkStatusValue

        com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.ContactLinkStatus LinkStatusValue
        See the {@link LinkStatus} class page for the possible enum values.

      • Linked

        boolean Linked
        Verifies a link status is one of:
        BROKEN
        Linked but the contact was not found in the Address Book.
        NOT_SYNCED
        Linked but not in sync because the remote contact has changed. The local contact might or might not have changed since last sync.
        SYNCED_REMOTE
        Linked but not in sync because the local contact has changed. The remote contact has not changed since the last sync. Compare the local and remote contact to see if key match fields were changed to prevent overwriting the remote contact in error.
        SYNCED
        Linked and the key local and remote contact fields are in agreement.

      • Synced

        boolean Synced
        Tests if the current link status is synced or not.

      • SyncedRemote

        boolean SyncedRemote
        Verifies a link status is one of:
        SYNCED_REMOTE
        Linked but not in sync because the local contact has changed. The remote contact has not changed since the last sync. Compare the local and remote contact to see if key match fields were changed to prevent overwriting the remote contact in error.
        SYNCED
        Linked and the key local and remote contact fields are in agreement.
